0.mMediaDescription: Bennett takes us up close with Milly, our three-banded armadillo, and Anna from Horticulture.

1.mMediaDescription: We want to give a big shout-out to our Zoo volunteers as this week is the 50th anniversary of #VolunteerAppreciationWeek!

2.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Lisa shares more about one of our nocturnal friends, Ninerec the tenrec!

3.mMediaDescription: We weren't able to bring you updates from our bat cave this morning, but Suzanne's got you covered!

4.mMediaTitle: Animal Spotlight: Alice the Patas Monkey
4.mMediaDescription: Meet Alice, a patas monkey who is visually impaired. Learn how she safely navigates her habitat alongside two other female patas monkeys.

5.mMediaDescription: In November 2019, our red pandas, Také and Li Ming, moved to their new home in the Children's Zoo, next to the Bug House.

6.mMediaTitle: Hirola Conservation Program - Update from Ali
6.mMediaDescription: With the support of the Houston Zoo, our partners at Hirola Conservation Program are protecting giraffes in the wild from poaching and replanting habitats for ...

7.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Cheka shares more about our orangutans, Rudi and Kelly from their habitat!

8.mMediaDescription: Water Quality Technician Karen takes us on an up-close look from inside our Kathrine G. McGovern Texas Wetlands.

9.mMediaDescription: Learn more about the playful North American river otter from Zookeeper Jay and meet otters, Jack and Belle!

10.mMediaDescription: Texas is home to more snake species than any other state in the U.S. Learn more about some of our native species from Zookeeper Chris!

11.mMediaTitle: Ewaso Lions - Update from Jeneria Lekilelei
11.mMediaDescription: We are continuing our wildlife-saving work around the world. Our lion-saving partners in Africa are continuing their efforts, while practicing appropriate safety ...

12.mMediaDescription: Did you know meerkats can dig 6-7 ft. below ground! Learn more about our mob from Zookeeper Hayley as she takes you up close with our meerkats.

13.mMediaDescription: Learn more about our flamboyance of flamingos from Zookeeper Steve!

14.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Heather takes viewers up close at our Coastal Pool to learn more about our brown pelicans, ruddy ducks, and laughing gull.

15.mMediaDescription: Okapis are the only living relative of giraffes. Learn more about our Okapis, Kwame and Sukari from Zookeeper Jessica.

16.mMediaDescription: It's about to get otterly adorable! Zookeeper Priscilla shares more about our two Asian small-clawed otters, Danh Tu and Hope.

17.mMediaTitle: April 9 - Sea Turtle Exam at the Vet Clinic
17.mMediaDescription: Take a behind scenes look at our veterinary clinic with Dr. Joe as Dr. Judilee performs an exam on a wild green sea turtle.

18.mMediaTitle: Animal Spotlight: Max the Elephant Barn Dog
18.mMediaDescription: Max is all of us on #ZooLoversDay! We're missing our visitors a little extra today, and luckily Max has been checking in on his neighbors.

19.mMediaDescription: Learn more about one of the most unique mammals in the world from Zookeeper Hayley and Peter, vice president of conservation & education.

20.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Memory is taking you behind the scenes to meet Mumbles our white rhino!

21.mMediaDescription: Our Zookeepers Scott, Chris, and Priscilla are taking you up close to meet the largest living tortoise, the Galapagos tortoise, along with a few of our other tortoise ...

22.mMediaDescription: We're taking you behind the scenes at the Bug House with Zookeeper Julie and General Curator Kevin!

23.mMediaTitle: Animal Spotlight: Berani the Malayan Tiger
23.mMediaDescription: Discover more about Berani, our seven-year-old Malayan tiger, and how we are helping save tigers in the wild.

24.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Kenny is talking all about our school of red-bellied piranhas and highlighting a feeding.

25.mMediaDescription: General Curator Kevin and our Carnivore team are sharing all about our cougars, Shasta and Haley, from our cougar den.

26.mMediaDescription: Red river hogs hearing is so good that they can detect the movement of an earthworm in the dirt.

27.mMediaDescription: Zookeeper Sydney is here to tell you all about Clark, our green-winged macaw, including his favorite song!

28.mMediaDescription: Hoofstock Keeper Kendall shares a six-month update on our youngest Masai giraffe, Bobbie!

29.mMediaDescription: Zookeepers Marisol and Natalie are sharing more about our adorable red pandas, Li Ming and Také.

30.mMediaTitle: Clouded Leopard Cubs: Nova and Luna
30.mMediaDescription: Our clouded leopard cubs are growing and starting to explore their habitat. Check out the cuteness!

31.mMediaDescription: Our Zookeepers Kathy and Danielle are taking you on an up-close adventure with our clouded cubs, Nova and Luna!

32.mMediaDescription: Get an up-close look at sea lion training and enrichment with sea lions Jonah and Kamia along with their keepers Sophie, Krista, and Amanda.

33.mMediaDescription: Meet our gorilla bachelors! Chaka, Ajari, Henry, TJ, and Leom met for the first time last week. Zookeeper Kayla shares how they are adjusting and interacting ...

34.mMediaDescription: We're expecting a baby elephant to join our herd this spring! Check out the latest updates of our soon-to-be-mom, Shanti.

35.mMediaDescription: Brothers Max and Murray have the right idea, swinging around and eating plenty of greens. Gibbons have the longest arm length relative to body size of any ...

36.mMediaDescription: Once on the brink of extinction, learn more about our whooping cranes, Heiden and Angel, who reside in our Kathrine G. McGovern Texas Wetlands Exhibit.

37.mMediaDescription: Have a zen moment to yourself and relax by watching our moon jellyfish at the Houston Zoo.

38.mMediaDescription: Meet Primates Zookeepers Agnieszka and Victoria as they highlight our chimpanzee troop.

39.mMediaDescription: Learn more about our mongoose mob from Children's Zookeeper Brian.

40.mMediaDescription: Hang with Curly the sloth and his zookeepers and learn more about our two-toed sloth.

41.mMediaDescription: Zookeepers Mandy and Kim take us up-close during an elephant bath with elephants Tess, Tupelo, and Tilly. Tune in to see the surprise cameo!

42.mMediaDescription: Tag along on a cheetah walk with the carnivore team and Dash, one of our male cheetahs here at the Zoo.

43.mMediaDescription: It's a goat social! Children's Zookeepers Natalie and Dan are bringing some of our adorable goats to you.

44.mMediaDescription: Our giraffes can brighten anyone's day! Elephant zookeepers Heather and John share all about our giraffe herd.

45.mMediaDescription: Your imagination comes to life at TXU Energy presents Dragons at the Houston Zoo! Guests of all ages are invited to experience the thrill of seeing these ...

46.mMediaDescription: Construction is in full swing for our exhibit, South America's Pantanal, which is set to open this summer. We recently installed our giant acrylic viewing windows ...

47.mMediaDescription: There is still time to see TXU Energy Presents Zoo Lights, now through Jan. 12. Come see Houston Zoo transform into a winter wonderland. Buy your Zoo Lights ...

48.mMediaTitle: Happy Holidays from the Houston Zoo!

49.mMediaDescription: Meet Rudi Valentino! He is the longest living resident at the Houston Zoo and is the oldest male orangutan in North America.
